entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who are about to have their first flying lesson. He is mentioned as having heard Fred and George Weasley complain about the school brooms.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is a student who has complained about the school brooms with his brother George.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is a student who has complained about the school brooms with his brother Fred.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is their teacher for the flying lesson. She arrives and instructs them to stand by their broomsticks.

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: The Forbidden Forest is a location on the opposite side of the grounds from where they are having their flying lesson. Its trees are swaying darkly in the distance.

relationships.description: Madam Hooch is teaching Harry and his fellow students how to fly on broomsticks.
Fred Weasley and George Weasley are brothers who have complained about the school brooms.
